name: Qt4-fsarchiver
tagline: Description  qt4-fsarchiver is a GUI for the program fsarchiver to save/restore partitions, folders and MBR/GPT. The programm is for systems based Debian, for Suse and Fedora. Look: http://wiki.ubuntuusers.de/qt4-fsarchiver. Language: German, English, partially Russia. Notes in Readme (Liesmich) for install in Suse, Fedora and Debian based systems. There are live CD based on Ubuntu precise language into Enlisch and German. More options:: Backing and restoring GUID Partition Table is possible. Clone a hard drive, create und restore an Image from a hard drive New: There are rpm packages for Fedora20 and SUSE
body:
qt4-fsarchiver ==============
â€º

Description

qt4-fsarchiver is a GUI for the program fsarchiver to save/restore partitions, folders and MBR/GPT. The programm is for systems based Debian, for Suse and Fedora. Look: http://wiki.ubuntuusers.de/qt4-fsarchiver. Language: German, English, partially Russia. Notes in Readme (Liesmich) for install in Suse, Fedora and Debian based systems. There are live CD based on Ubuntu precise language into Enlisch and German.
More options::
Backing and restoring GUID Partition Table is possible.
Clone a hard drive, create und restore an Image from a hard drive
New: There are rpm packages for Fedora20 and SUSE

qt4-fsarchiver Web Site
